channel.description: Recent content in Hue on Travel.Sleep.Repeat

item.title: Going to Hue? Save it for a Day Trip
item.description: As we make our way South of Vietnam we decided to spend a couple of nights in Hue. We got a day train from Hanoi to Hue. Our train departed 06:00 morning and arrived into Hue at 20:30. The soft seats we booked were manageable for the duration, although the carriages weren’t in the best of condition. There were so many bugs crawling all over carriage walls and curtains, whilst the overheard TV’s blared out Vietnam’s latest hits and showed Indian films dubbed in Vietnamese (random!
